description.en:
Unity Protocol is a Blockchain based Technology, which aims of becoming one of the most secure Decentralized Exchange. We chose to call ourselves ""Unity"" as it indicates the integrity and ability of Team Work. Unity is more than just a Token, our concept is to combine all of its development components into a single reputive idea. We are dedicated to create a one stop backing and trustworthy solution to all the proceeding issues such as, whether it is securing your Cryptocurrency in an Affix Wallet or Managing your assets.
Our first and foremost priority is your security. Therefore, our Vision is to become one of the most securely acquired Decentralized Exchange. Our Native Token Unity will also be operated as to create awareness in regards to the potential of Cryptocurrency for those who are unmindful or are unknown to its future benefits. Our team will consciously assist our customers through this Exchange or by the NFT Marketplace, guiding them towards the entire knowledge and understanding of the Crypto World.
